title: Type Design Class NYC
content:
I wanted to let everyone know that there is a great class starting in the fall at Cooper Union.

I have been taking private classes with Hannes Famira, and it has been hugely beneficial to my development as a type designer.

I went from barely clunking around in FontLab to producing a type family which was accepted by FontShop and Village, the latter of whom I will distributing with.

I recommend it to anyone in the New York area who is serious about type.

You can register for his class here: [http://www.cooper.edu/ce/calligph.html#p105](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326124026/http:/www.cooper.edu/ce/calligph.html#p105 "http://www.cooper.edu/ce/calligph.html#p105")

And learn more about Hannes and his teaching philosophy here: [http://www.typedu.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326124026/http:/www.typedu.org/ "http://www.typedu.org")

Jeremy
author: jmickel

comments.content: Hey, Jeremy! Thanks for the info -- I believe Hannes also taught this class in 2006, at least according to this [**Typographica post**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150326124026/http:/typographica.org/001056.php).
